assertion: I was sacked from my job at a zoo, when my boss found I'd been taking photos of the animals wearing hats.
This is my Orchidometer, it was a present from my sister.
Mackenzie hoaxed his school by burying some "treasure", Simon found it and the police were called.
In a virtual world, they are married.
He has a tattoo of David's face on his knee.
I once helped my Mum and Dad look for something they'd lost, using a Oujia Board.
If I ever get stuck on a crossword clue I phone Tim Henman for help, he hasn't let me down yet.
I once paid for some Tapas with a Nissan Micra.
